summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 23, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between Brooklyn Avenue and University Way, from East 40th Street to East 41st Street; all in the City of Seattle; all in accordance with Resolution No. 6913 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
